title: Undefeated God of War - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Xuanhuan
tags: Absent Parents   Adapted to Manhua   Army Building   Artifacts   Average-looking Protagonist   Bloodlines   Childhood Friends   Cultivation   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Friendship   Hard-Working Protagonist   Late Romance   Magical Space   Male Protagonist   Martial Spirits   Money Grubber   Multiple Realms   Mysterious Past   Naive Protagonist   Revenge   Romantic Subplot   Sharp-tongued Characters   Spirit Advisor   Wars

description:
Youth, is meant to be used to shed sweat under the sun!

Youth, is to continuously engage in battles, and secure the win! The endless journey on Heaven’s Road, an endless expedition, a testimony of a hot-blooded youth’s legend!

A dream every man harbors, with the ignition of the blood! Forever young, Undefeated God of War!>
